levelList.name: Cascading Gaze of Awe Underneath Contempt
levelList.desc:
External effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
Prioritizes targeting enemies with [GazeRyoshu] or [ContemptRyoshu] as sub-targets
- Deals -50% damage against sub-targets
If there is just a single target, deal +200% damage (for Focused Encounters, a Part)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 4 ([Laceration] + [Vibration]) on the main target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +2% damage for every ([Laceration] + [Vibration]) on the main target (max 50%)
[WhenUse] Deal +7% damage for every 1 (sum of [GazeRyoshu] on all attack targets) (max 49%)
[EndSkill] Consumes [GazeRyoshu] or [ContemptRyoshu] on all targets that were hit

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

coindescs.desc: This Coin deals damage only against the main target
This Coin deals damage only against the sub-targets
- If the first Coin wasn't a Critical Hit, and if N Corp. E.G.O::<noparse>Contempt</noparse>, Awe Ryōshū survived, 1 random sub-target takes damage
Deal +<style="highlight">40</style>% damage for every [BoseProjektil] on self (max <style="highlight">280</style>%)
+<style="highlight">5</style>% Damage on Critical Hit for every [Breath] Potency (max <style="highlight">50</style>%)
+<style="highlight">10</style>% Damage on Critical Hit for every [BoseProjektil] on self (max <style="highlight">70</style>%)
Deal +1% damage for every 1% missing HP on the main target (max 100%)
